law.catch_line: Presumption as to interest on foreign debt or judgment.
law.text: Any indebtedness incurred or judgment rendered out of this state is presumed to bear interest in accordance with the provisions of KRS 360.040.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 7, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1982. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2221.
